31335.「要求通り オレと <cs_pchero>の\n ふたりだけで 来てやったぞぉ！:
Hey, Sainz!
As requested, it's just me and <pc>!
Come on out!!

31337.「……バトルマスターの証は\n ちゃんと 持ってきたんでしょうね？:
You didn't forget your Gladiator's
Grant, I hope?

31338.「ああ。肌身 はなさずにな。\n しかし オメーが そんなにまで\n こいつを:
Yeah, I got it. I always keep it close.
I didn't know you wanted it so badly.

31339.「そいつは アンタが オレのことを\n 認めなかった証ですからね……。:
It's proof that you never acknowledged my
skills...

31340.「今から アンタの自慢の弟子を倒し\n オレこそが 証を受け継ぐにふさわしい\n:
I'm going to take down your prized pupil, and
prove that I am the true battlemaster worthy
of inheriting the Grant!

31341.「オメーは 相変わらず わかっちゃいねーな。\n オレたちは 狂戦士じゃないんだ:
You still don't get it, do you?
We're not mindless warriors...
It's not just about being strong.

31342.「アンタは いつだって それだ！\n バトルマスターは 戦いに生きる存在だぜ。\:
You're always like that!! Battlemasters live
for the fight! What else matters other than
strength?!

31343.「……まあいいさ。\n そんなヤツに オレが手塩にかけて育てた\n <cs_pc:
Fine, be that way... There's no chance that my
prized pupil is going to lose to someone like
you.

31344.「そういうワケだ。\n あとのことは まかせたぜ。<cs_pchero>！: And that's why...the rest is up to you!

31345.「<cs_pchero>。お前のことは 恨んじゃいねえ。\n だが オレの強さを:
I hold no grudge against you, <cs_pchero>.
But I WILL beat you just to prove how strong
I really am!

31346.「恨むんなら ジェイコフの弟子になった\n 自分のウカツさを 恨むんだな！！:
If you must blame someone, then blame yourself
for being stupid enough to become Jakov's
pupil!!

31347.「おせーよ <cs_pchero>。\n 待ちくたびれたじゃねーか。:
You're late, <cs_pchero>.
I was getting sick of waiting.

31348.「てっきり 逃げだしたかと思ったが……\n まだ 痛めつけられ足りないようだな。:
I thought for sure you'd run away, but...
I guess you've come back for more.

31349.「さあ 今度こそ どちらが\n バトルマスターの証を継ぐに ふさわしいか\n 決:
Now, let's see who is worthy to hold the
Gladiator's Grant!

31350.「ぐうっ……クソッ！\n なぜだ？ なぜ 勝てないっ！？:
Ugh... Damn it all!
Why...? Why can't I win?!?

31351.「オレは ただ ひたすら 強くなるためだけに\n すべてを なげうってきたっての:
I've given up everything just to become
stronger...

31352.「……だからだよ。オメーの強さは\n オメー自身のためのものでしかねえ。\n 本:
...That's exactly why! Your strength is only
for yourself! A true battlemaster is...

31353.「セインズよ。せっかく 手を回して\n 復讐の機会を与えてやったのに そのザマか:
Sainz... I gave you a chance for revenge,
and this is how you repay me?

31354.「……まあ いい。\n そのふたりを 呼び寄せたことで\n おまえは用済みだ。も:
Well, whatever. Now that these two are here,
I no longer have a use for you. You can die
together!!

31356.「……弟子のモノは 師匠のモノ。\n オメーの命は オレのモノってことさ。\n:
...A pupil's belongings are their master's.
Your life is in my hands. I'm not gonna let
you die!

31357.「くっ……悪いな <cs_pchero>。 \n このバケモノの相手は オメーに:
Ggh... Sorry, <cs_pchero>.
I'm countin' on you to deal with this
monster!

31358.「すぐに 戦闘の準備を万全にして\n 戻ってきてくれ。それまで この場は\n な:
Go get yourself ready and then come back
here. We'll hold the fort down until then!

31359.「おせーよ <cs_pchero>。\n 待ちくたびれたじゃねーか。:
You're late, <cs_pchero>.
I was getting sick of waiting.

31360.「いいな。セインズのバカたれに\n 真のバトルマスターの すごみを\n 教えてや:
Good. Now show this idiot behind me what a
TRUE battlemaster can do!!

46606.「今度こそ セインズのバカたれに\n 真のバトルマスターの すごみを\n 教えて:
Now show this idiot behind me what a
TRUE battlemaster can do!!

46607.「セインズ 目に焼きつけとけよ。 \n <cs_pchero>が 真のバトルマス:
Sainz, keep it in your eyes. Because
<cs_pchero> is going to show you a true
battle master's fight.

60360.「バ バカな……わしの最強のペットが……。: This can't be... My most powerful pet...!

60362.「おっと。今度こそ 逃がしゃしねーぞ！:
Don't think so, buddy. You're not gettin' away
this time!

60363.「……ブランドンさん。\n あんたの野望も もう おしまいだ。\n そろそろ 観: It's over, Brandon. It's time to give up.

60365.「<cs_pchero>。\n お前の戦いを見ていて 師匠の言うことが\n わか:
When I watched you fight, I think I finally
understood the meaning of our master's
words.

60366.「自分のためじゃなく\n 誰かのために戦う……そのための剣。\n それが バトル:
Fighting for someone else, and not just for
yourself...that is the meaning of the sword.
That's what a battlemaster really is.

60367.「さあ これにて 一件落着だ。\n ラッカラン島のコロシアムに\n 戻るとするか:
Well, that settles that. Shall we head back
to the Coliseum?
